svg.text: AI-Orchestrated Team Learning and Expertise Amplification Network

g.text: ✓ React Patterns: Sarah → Emma (Advanced hooks implementation)
✓ API Security: David → Marcus (OAuth 2.0 best practices)
⏳ DevOps Patterns: Lisa → Alex (CI/CD pipeline optimization)
• Increase pairing sessions with Sarah (+20% learning velocity)
• Focus on practical projects for better retention

svg.title: Knowledge Transfer Accelerator - AI-Orchestrated Team Learning Network
svg.desc: Interactive knowledge transfer system showing AI-orchestrated team learning with expertise mapping, mentorship connections, personalized learning paths, and learning analytics. Features team expertise network with 6 developers at different skill levels, AI knowledge orchestrator, mentorship relationships, and comprehensive learning dashboard showing 2.8x learning velocity and 94% knowledge coverage.
